'''Wanmin Restaurant's Boiled Fish''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Black-Back Perch Stew]] with [[Xiangling]]. The [[recipe]] for Black-Back Perch Stew is obtainable from [[Wanmin Restaurant]] for 5,000 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 30.

Wanmin Restaurant's Boiled Fish restores '''34'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''980''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
